questionText:
Help us monitor the occurance and absence of mass mating mangrove crabs Ucides cordatus and Cardisoma guanhumi, in relation to the moon, between November and April.

This information will help to improve fishing legislation which prohibits the catch of these crabs during mass mating.

Click on the below pictures if you would like to share your observations.

For more information on this project see menu.

choiceOneText: I want to report the occurrence of andada
choiceTwoText: I want to inform absence of andada

choiceOneText: There was NO andada after the new moon
choiceTwoText: There was NO andada after the full moon

choiceOneText: I want to register more occurrences or absences of andadas
choiceTwoText: I want to proceed with information about my locality

description: Click on the days that you noted andada

Click the day that andada it was strongest

questionTitle: Click on the period (moon phase) when andada occured.  In case you don't know proceed to the next page.
description: Select the state where you made our observation

Enter the city closest to your mangrove
